text: قالوا۟ سبحن ربنا انا كنا ظلمين

translations.translation: They said, 'Glory be to our Lord! Truly we have been wrongdoers.'
Glory to our Lord," they said; we were really in the wrong."
They cried out: “Glory be to our Lord! Certainly we were sinners.”
They said, "All glory belongs to God. We have certainly been unjust".
They said, “Purity is to our Lord – we have indeed been unjust.”
They said: "Glory to Our Lord! Verily, we have been wrongdoers."
They said: Glory be to our Lord, surely we were unjust.
They said, 'Glory be to God, our Lord; truly, we were evildoers.'
They said: Glorified be our Lord! Lo! we have been wrong-doers.
They said, "Glory be to God, our Lord. We have surely done wrong."
They said: hallowed be Our Lord! verily we have been wrong- doers.
They said, ‘Immaculate is our Lord! We have indeed been wrongdoers!’
They said: "Glory to our Lord! Verily we have been doing wrong!"
They said: "Glory to Our Lord! Verily, we have been Zalimun (wrong-doers, etc.)."
Exaltations to Allah, our Lord' they said, 'We were truly harmdoers'
They said, “Glory to our Lord—We were indeed in the wrong.”
They said, "Exalted is our Lord! Indeed, we were wrongdoers."
[68:29] They said, ‘Glory be to God, our Lord. Verily we have been wrongdoers’, by denying the poor folk [what is] their due.

(They said: Glorified be our Lord!) We ask forgiveness of our Lord. (Lo! we have been wrong-doers) we harmed ourselves by our transgression and intention to deprive the needy ones and also by failing to say "Allah willing".

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
وبعدما وقعوا في الشدة والبلاء اعترفوا بالظلم، حيث { قَالُواْ } عن كمال الندامة والإنابة: { سُبْحَانَ رَبِّنَآ } ننزهك من أن ينازعك في ملكك وسلطانك، أو يخالف حكمك أو شأنك { إِنَّا كُنَّا ظَالِمِينَ } [القلم: 29] خارجين عن أمرك بالإنفاق، معرضين أنفسنا على عذابك وانتقامك




تب علينا بفضلك وكرمك

[البقرة: 129]
